div.p: A set of codes that describe patient info viewing privileges base on adoption status.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-hspc-adoptionInfo defines the following codes:

tr.td: An indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time prior to a patient's adoption and therefore cannot be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.
An indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time after a patient's adoption and can be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.
